div.p: This profile defines several extensions relevant to the US realm

ul.li: race - (0..1) A CodeableConcept bound to the v3 valueset for Race
ethnicity - (0..1) A CodeableConcept bound to the v3 valueset for Ethnicity
county - (0..1) A string containing the name of the county

div.p: An example Patient showing these extensions can be found here.
